reviewText: I am a coach for a semi-pro football team.  Very user friendly it makes things easier for the coaches to past on to the players.

Great video for anyone starting out in football or for a parent to help their son. Fundamentals are important and this teaches the fundamentals with players in the beginning and then whiteboard work toward the end. Really enjoyed this video.
Very good video.  Timeless techniques and drills that you can incorporate in to your coaching today.
